Thank you for contributing ideas to Gideon! Use this template to suggest new features, enhancements, or improvements. Provide as much detail as possible to help us understand and prioritize your request. If this is a bug report, please use the Bug Report template instead.

## Feature Request

### Title
[A concise, descriptive title for the feature]

### Description
[Provide a clear and detailed description of the feature you'd like to see. What problem does it solve? How would it benefit users?]

### Use Case
[Describe the scenario or workflow where this feature would be useful. Who would use it (e.g., SOC analysts, researchers)? Include any examples or user stories.]

### Proposed Solution
[Optional: Suggest how this could be implemented, including any technical details, integrations, or UI/CLI changes. If you're unsure, leave this blank.]

### Alternatives Considered
[Optional: Mention any workarounds you're currently using or other solutions you've thought about, and why they're not ideal.]

### Additional Context
[Any other info, such as screenshots, mockups, related projects, or links to similar features in other tools.]

### Priority Suggestion
- [ ] High: Essential for core functionality or many users.
- [ ] Medium: Valuable addition that improves usability.
- [ ] Low: Nice-to-have enhancement.

We'll review your request and may reach out for more details. If it aligns with our roadmap, we'll add it to the backlog. Feel free to open a Pull Request if you'd like to implement it yourself!
